commit message: Small refactoring in preparation for smoother scrolling.
Removed scaling and let the platform handle it.
Slight delay on loading for smoother scrolling.
Removed FakeFeedTask, since it duplicated LoadThumnailTask
Implemented resume after incoming call during TTS.
Created nicer buttons for book details.
Made library look consistent with catalog.
Small fixes to details cover loading.
Properly cancels tasks, should fix sync.
Dialog should now always show again.
Used setMessage instead of setTitle, which looks a lot nicer.
Small tweaks to dialog and TTS resume.
